categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: This bird was an avian that lived on the Mud Moon of Panna. The animal had blue feathers, a long, thin beak, large and pale bulbous eyes, and long, thin legs nearly equal in length to its body, from beak to tail tip.

The bird species fed at waterways and walked through the garbage heaps outside of Panna City. One specimen witnessed the bounty hunter Boba Fett and Wookiee Rebel Chewbacca leave the city on a Paar's ichthyodont shortly after the Battle of Yavin, being pursued by an Imperial patrol on an Imperial Speeder.
